name.baseName: Highly Concentrated Brine Production ; Highly Concentrated Brine (6% Lithium) ; Solar Pond Evaporation ; Salar de Atacama, Chile (0.17% Lithium)
高浓卤水生产 ; 高浓卤水（锂含量6%） ; 太阳池蒸发法 ; 智利阿塔盐湖（锂含量0.17%）

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Lithium has historically been produced from subterranean brines in the Andean mountain region of Chile in the area known as the “Lithium Triangle,” which also includes parts of Bolivia and Argentina. There are also several other lithium-rich brine locations throughout the world, and each brine has a unique chemical composition, which necessitates different processes for isolating the desired end products (Wietelmann and Steinbild, 2014). This LCA considers the brines in the Atacama Desert of Chile, known as the Salar de Atacama. The brines are concentrated, processed into battery grade Li2CO3 and LiOH•H2O, and shipped worldwide for processing into battery cathode materials and, eventually, batteries.

历史上，锂一直产自智利安第斯山区的地下卤水，该地区被称为 "锂三角"，还包括玻利维亚和阿根廷的部分地区。全世界还有其他几个富含锂的卤水产地，每种卤水都有独特的化学成分，因此需要不同的工艺来分离出所需的最终产品（Wietelmann 和 Steinbild，2014 年）。本项生命周期评估考虑的是智利阿塔卡马沙漠中的卤水，即阿塔卡马盐湖。盐水经过浓缩，加工成电池级 Li2CO3 和 LiOH-H2O，然后运往世界各地加工成电池阴极材料，最终制成电池。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The Salar de Atacama basin receives between 5 and 120 mm of annual rainfall depending on the specific location. To produce concentrated brine, a low-concentration brine (~0.17% lithium concentration, which is 70% water by mass and the remainder other minerals) is pumped to the surface and into a drying pond where it can be exposed to the sun and heat to facilitate evaporation. These ponds are in the southern part of the Salar de Atacama, which receives less rain, thereby facilitating effective evaporation.
根据具体地点的不同，阿塔卡马盐湖盆地的年降雨量在 5 毫米到 120 毫米之间。为生产浓缩盐水，低浓度盐水（锂浓度约为 0.17%，其中 70% 为水，其余为其他矿物质）会被泵送到地表，并进入一个干燥池，在那里接受阳光和热量的照射，以促进蒸发。这些池塘位于阿塔卡马盐湖的南部，降雨较少，因此有利于有效蒸发。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The process data represents the production of highly concentrated brine with a lithium content of 6% using solar pond evaporation methods at the Salar de Atacama in Chile. Such brine is typically used as a feedstock for the extraction and production of lithium compounds, which are essential in manufacturing batteries for electronic devices and electric vehicles, among other applications.
该工艺数据代表了利用智利阿塔卡马盐湖的太阳池蒸发方法生产含6%锂的高浓卤水。这种卤水通常用作提取和生产锂化合物的原料，这些锂化合物是制造电子设备和电动汽车等多种应用中不可或缺的。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this dataset for Life Cycle Assessment, take into account that the data excludes the production processes for raw materials and energy flows with very small amounts (less than 1%). This exclusion may be significant in certain contexts, particularly in fine-grained LCA studies where even small inputs could contribute to the overall environmental impact. Users should consider supplementing this dataset with additional information if these minor flows are deemed essential for their specific LCA.
在使用此数据集进行生命周期评估时，请注意，数据排除了原材料的生产流程和非常小量（少于1%）的能源流。在某些情况下，这种排除可能具有重要性，尤其是在即使是小量输入也可能对整体环境影响有所贡献的精细生命周期评估研究中。如果这些轻微流量被认为对特定的生命周期评估至关重要，用户应考虑用额外信息补充本数据集。
